text: Danica Patrick turned 36 on Sunday, March 25th and celebrated her birthday as all birthday ’ s should be celebrated, with champagne, thigh - high suede boots and Aaron Rodgers. “ I love getting older!!!!!!!!!!! ” Patrick wrote in her Instagram caption. “ Super grateful for all the love around me in my life! People, work, opportunities, dreams ….. full heart space! Don ’ t forget to dream big for the things you want in your life! ” If your ’ e counting, that ’ s a total of 14 exclamation points in one Insta post. She ’ s very excited about birthdays!!!! The party also had a unicorn theme and featured silly unicorn hats ( for the women only ) and a unicorn cake.
